resources.string: You\'ve say nothing about name of your quest. People don\'t believe you.
You\'ve been pronouncing name of quest too long. People don\'t understand you.
Quest title should be less than 25 characters long.
You\'ve said nothing about details of your quest. People don\'t believe you.
You\'ve said, that you\'ll start doing quest aftet finishing it. People don\'t understand you.
StartTime should be less than Deadline.
You\'ve said, that you\'ll finish quest by past date. People don\'t understand you.
Deadline should be more than current date and time.
